title: 87/193/EEC: Commission Decision of 5 March 1987 on the improvement of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the Dutch text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 5 March 1987
on the improvement of agricultural structures in the Netherlands pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the Dutch text is authentic)
(87/193/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The measures adopted in the Netherlands pursuant to Titles I and III of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 and referred to in the recitals continue to satisfy the conditions for a financial contribution by the Community towards the common measure referred to in Article 1 of that Regulation.
This Decision is addressed to the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 March 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 194, 17. 7. 1986, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1986, p. 57.
